page.title: 12A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: {A typical Sunday in the life of Chris {Hall age 11.} 08.15 Woke up.Woke up brother to get Fathers Day card. 08.21 Woke sister and went downstairs to wake eldest brother and to get present.08.30 took present to dad then all went back to bed.09.25 All get up for breakfast. 09.55 GET dressed.10.00 Went to friend's house,played on his computer. 12.30 Went home.13.00 Had dinner.13.45 Went back to friend and played football.15.00 Went in to play on computer.16.00 Watched T.V.16.45 went to Village Hall on a message for his mum.16.50 Returned and went for another friend.17.00 Played football. 18.00 Went home 18.15 Had tea.18.45 Played cricket with rest of family in back garden.19.45 Had a bath and washed my hair.20.15 watched T.V. 22.05 WEnt to bed
